## rds-list Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                  | Type                                                                                        | Default       |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `active`  | `active`  | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> Determines the visibility of a list.<br/><br/>                               | `boolean`                                                                                   | `false`       |
| `divided` | `divided` | If true, will place a horizontal border between description list items.                                                      | `boolean`                                                                                   | `undefined`   |
| `narrow`  | `narrow`  | Sets the width of the list item. If true, will not expand past its contents. If false, will reach full width possible.       | `boolean`                                                                                   | `false`       |
| `striped` | `striped` | If true, will zebra-stripe alternating description list items. List type must be `description` for this prop to take effect. | `boolean`                                                                                   | `undefined`   |
| `type`    | `type`    | Sets the type of the list.                                                                                                   | `"description" , "navigation" , "none" , "ordered" , "stacked" , "sub" , "unordered"` | `'unordered'` |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                         |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
|      | Used to add list items to the list. |


----------------------------------------------
